thread.title: Massive 11th hour migrant influx expected as EU demands Britain open borders until 2019
thread.title_full: Massive 11th hour migrant influx expected as EU demands Britain open borders until 2019

title: Massive 11th hour migrant influx expected as EU demands Britain open borders until 2019
text:
Massive 11th hour migrant influx expected as EU demands Britain open borders until 2019 Massive 11th hour migrant influx expected as EU demands Britain open borders until 2019 EU chiefs are to demand European nationals who arrive in Britain over the next two years are allowed to stay permanently. PUBLISHED: 10:11, Sun, Feb 26, 2017 | UPDATED: 10:55, Sun, Feb 26, 2017 GETTY Theresa May has been under pressure to take a strong line on the Brexit cut off 
Under informal Brexit rules it was expected that the cut-off point would be the date of the referendum. 
But pressure is expected from the EU to push the cut-off date to 2019 – triggering a huge rush of last-minute EU nationals settling in the UK. 
The move is set to cause outrage among MPs who have put pressure on Theresa May to take a strong line and bar those who arrived after last year’s June 23 referendum from being allowed to stay. 
The demand came during a meeting chaired by EU chief Brexit negotiator Michel Barnier. Related articles
